Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.20097251]Non-hemolytic effect against mouse erythrocytes even at 101 μM
Sequence Information.Structure Description: CD results indicate that meucin-25 mainly adopts a beta-sheet structure in water but TFE promotes its alpha-helical formation, suggesting its conformational flexibility.
Sequence Information.Function: This synthetic cationic peptide inhibits the development of Plasmodium berghei ookinetes, kills intraerythrocytic P. falciparum, and is cytotoxic to the Drosophila S2 cell at micromolar concentrations. No hemolytic activities have been found at micromolar concentrations.

Literature.Title: Characterization of two linear cationic antimalarial peptides in the scorpion Mesobuthus eupeus.
